item.title: How to get the npc to say somthing ? help please
item.dc:creator: @Jman1233 Jman1233
item.description:
@Jman1233 wrote:

You can also look up the npcs id in your npc.cfg. Just search the npcs name and its id is next to it.

item.title: How to get the npc to say somthing ? help please
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

go into npchandler.java search for npc’s name or what it says now or id…if you find it then find the quotes saying something like"Hello, Me Namer Jad, Welcome To KackScape!!!" or “I Hope You Like Im Selling Rares!!!”

[code] }
if (npcs[i].npcType == 2745) { // Jad
if (misc.random2(22) == 1) {
npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
npcs[i].textUpdate = “Hello, Me Namer Jad, Welcome To KackScape!!!”;
}
}
if (npcs[i].npcType == 1552) { // santa
if (misc.random2(22) == 1) {
npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
npcs[i].textUpdate = “I Hope You Like Im Selling Rares!!!”;
}
}
if (npcs[i].npcType == 3351) { // Genie - Saradomin Stuff
if (misc.random2(30) == 1) {
npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
npcs[i].textUpdate = “Stuff Here!”;
}
}

				if (npcs[i].npcType == 944) {
					if (misc.random2(15) == 1) {
						npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
						npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
						npcs[i].textUpdate = "Come Here For Pure Stuff";
					}
				}[/code]

hope it helps…
